achievements.title: Russel Group Uni Student (York)
achievements.content: I attend the prestigious University of York (Russel Group) completing my BEng in Computer Science.

achievements.title: Commended in Business, Innovation & Entrepreneurship Course
achievements.content: I took an optional module on businesses development, focusing on early stages of project ideation. I worked in a team to pitch an ethical social media company in a “Dragon’s Den” type scenario. Our idea received a commended award and progressed to a second round of university wide pitching.

achievements.title: 4.5 Star Edinburgh Fringe Performer
achievements.content: I am the co-ordinary committee member for Comedy Society at the University of York and a member of the improvised comedy troupe the Shambles. With the Shambles I performed nightly in a 4.5 star run at the Edinburgh Fringe for two and a half weeks. This taught me teamwork to a high level in stressful environments, as we had to work collaboratively to build scenes together.

achievements.title: Year of Development Experience at Sanger
achievements.content: I worked for a year at the Wellcome Sanger Institute as a Software Developer.

achievements.title: Proficient in Python, Java, and Web Dev
achievements.content: Proficient in Python because I worked for a year using it. Used Java heavily in university. Proficient in basic web development, such as React which was used to create this website.

achievements.title: Six 90%-100% Uni Module Grades
achievements.content: Achieved top tier grades in Uni.
